phpstan.singleFileMode.description: Whether to scan only the file that is being saved, instead of the whole project. This is not recommended since it busts the cache. Only use this if your computer can't handle a full-project scan

phpstan.binCommand.description: PHPStan command. Use this instead of "binPath" if, for example, the phpstan binary is in your path

phpstan.configFile.description: Path to the config file (use a comma-separated list to resolve in order)

phpstan.paths.description: Path mapping for scanned files. Allows for rewriting paths for for example Docker.

phpstan.dockerContainerName.description: Name of the Docker container to use for scanning

phpstan.options.description: Extra commandline options to be passed to PHPStan. Supports substituting ${workspaceFolder}

phpstan.enableStatusBar.description: Show the status bar while scanning

phpstan.enabled.description: Whether to enable the on-save checker

phpstan.projectTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for a full project check. After this time the checking process is canceled

phpstan.timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for a file check. After this time the checking process is canceled

phpstan.suppressTimeoutMessage.description: Stop showing an error when the operation times out

phpstan.showProgress.description: Show the progress bar when performing a single-file check

phpstan.showTypeOnHover.description: Show type information on hover. Disable this if you have a custom PHPStan binary that runs on another filesystem (such as Docker) or if you run into caching problems. Does not work with PHPStan Pro enabled or for PHPStan version < 1.8.0.

phpstan.enableLanguageServer.description: Enable language server that provides on-hover type information. Disable this if you have a custom PHPStan binary that runs on another filesystem (such as Docker) or if you run into caching problems. Does not work with PHPStan Pro enabled or for PHPStan version < 1.8.0.

phpstan.ignoreErrors.description: An array of regular expressions to ignore in PHPStan's error output. If PHPStan outputs some warnings/errors in stderr that can be ignored, put them in here and they'll no longer cause the process to exit with an error.

phpstan.suppressWorkspaceMessage.description: Stop showing an error when using a multi-workspace project

phpstan.pro.description: Use PHPStan Pro under the hood (if you have a license)

phpstan.tmpDir.description: Path to the PHPStan TMP directory. Lets PHPStan determine the TMP directory if not set.

phpstan.checkValidity.description: Check the validity of the PHP code before checking it with PHPStan. This is recommended only if you have autoSave enabled or for some other reason save syntactically invalid code. PHPStan tends to invalidate its cache when checking an invalid file, leading to a slower experience.

scripts.prepack: bun run generate-package && bun run prettier --check client server && bun run lint && bun run compile && bun run build
scripts.build: rimraf ./out && (bun run build:$VARIANT || bun run build:main)
scripts.build:main: bun run --cwd server build && bun run --cwd client build
scripts.build-debug:main: bun run --cwd server build-debug && bun run --cwd client build-debug
scripts.build-debug:attach-server: rimraf ./out && bun run --cwd server build-debug:attac-server && bun run --cwd client build-debug
scripts.format-staged: (git diff --ignore-submodules --quiet && bun run format) || pretty-quick client server
scripts.generate-package: generate-package-json generate --input shared/commands/defs.ts -w -p package.json --handler client/src/lib/commands.ts --validate --name PHPStan --prefix PHPStan && prettier --write package.json
scripts.prepush: bun run generate-package && bun run format-staged && bun run lint --fix && bun run compile
scripts.devBun: bun install && bun install --cwd client && bun install --cwd server
scripts.postinstall: bun install --cwd client && bun install --cwd server
scripts.dev: bun run devBun && cd test/demo && composer install && cd ../../php && composer install && cd vendor/phpstan && git clone https://github.com/phpstan/phpstan-src
